title: Manage a Layoff Notification
description: As part of a reduction in force, an HRBP must support a manager in notifying an employee that their position has been eliminated.

tasks.description: Prepare the separation packet for the affected employee, including severance details and benefits continuation (COBRA) information.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP prepares all required legal and informational documents.

tasks.description: Coach the manager on the messaging for the notification meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP provides the manager with a script and talking points.

tasks.description: Attend the notification meeting to answer HR-specific questions and collect company property.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP supports the meeting, explains the severance package, and collects the employee's laptop and badge.
